impact.name: Sandeep Walung
impact.description: 'Thanks to Rupie Finance, my business has grown tremendously!' I run an electric shop and getting a loan from Rupie Finance was one of the best decisions I’ve made. Their team made the entire process quick and hassle-free. With the loan, I was able to expand my shop, increase my inventory and serve more customers. Today, my business is doing better than ever. I’m truly grateful to Rupie Finance for supporting small business owners like me.

impact.name: Dilip Gabhale
impact.description: 'Thanks to Rupie Finance, I was able to start my own business!' Getting a loan from Rupie Finance was one of the best decisions I’ve made. Their process was simple and quick and the team was very supportive. With the loan, I started my food shop and began my journey as a business owner. Today, my shop is running successfully and I’m truly thankful to Rupie Finance for helping me take this first step.

impact.name: Sunil Kanaujiya
impact.description: 'Rupie Finance gave me the boost I needed to grow my business.' I own a mobile shop and with the help of Rupie Finance, I was able to upgrade my store and bring in more variety for my customers. Their loan process was smooth and the team guided me well throughout. My sales have increased and my shop has grown a lot since then.
